message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $16,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, even more so than that in the long run.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective on the price. However, I'm confident this product offers significant value beyond $12,000. Would you consider $14,500?
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I still think $12,000 is a fair price. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13,500?
